name: CTObox.co
tagline: Hire a CTO in a box to solve all of your problems
body:
### When there is something bad in your codebase, who you gonna call?

## CTO in a box!

So you've got a brilliant business but an impossible tech problem.  We'll solve it for you and provide 24/7 support for the life of our relationship.

## On-going Consulting

This isn't a one-off process.  We will get to know each other, we will understand your pain points, we will work together to devise a solution.  Then we'll service it and iterate and be a part of your team.  All for less than you would pay a single developer.

## Top of the line talent

We are the best in the biz.  Chocked full of PhDs and dev-ninjas, this is a passion for all of us, and our pedigree shows it.

## Always modern infrastructure

The world is always changing and being on the best platforms is a way to guarantee uptime, performance, scalability and low costs.  We'll migrate you when the time is right and keep your look fresh.

## Creating Value

This process is the heart of business.  Finding opportunities, creating value, providing top-notch service, and reducing costs.  It's a win-win at every level.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
